name: Forklift Simulator
description:
Forklift simulator is a challenging free simulation game. Working in a factory your job is to unload cargo and stack it on the correct shelves and remove cargo and place it on the truck in order for it to be shipped.

Realistic physics make this game a perfect forklift simulation game for anyone not squeamish of a challenge. Hit your target score quota before the time runs out in order to progress to the following levels and enjoy more forklift simulation fun.

- Challenging Levels.
- Match The Correct Colored Box To The Designated Space.
- Amazing vehicle Physics.
- Awesome 3D Gameplay.
